creator: 롯데면세점
descriptionHtml:
The whole new shopping experience unveiled at Lotte Online Duty Free.
Meet the most powerful duty free brand in Korea and enjoy the new mobile shopping experience faster and easier for everyone.

[Features]
1. All-in-one shopping app: Shop all Lotte Duty Free stores using one single duty free shopping app.
2. Quick shopping: Select colors, sizes, and options you want faster and easier.
3. Smart view: Take a quick look at the best-selling items, famous brands, membership rewards, and more!
4. Lotte Duty Free membership: Sign up in seconds and start getting rewarded today.

■ App permissions
Lotte Duty Free observes and is bound by Paragraph 2, Article 22 (Gathering and Handling of Personal Information) of the Act on Promotion of Utilization of Information and Communications Network. Please read the following details and allow Lotte Duty Free to access, collect, and use your personal information in accordance with the Network Act. The Lotte Duty Free App will access, collect, and use the following information only for the purposes stated. You can change your app permissions whenever you want. Additional permissions are not required to use the Lotte Duty Free App.

[Additional permissions are required for the followings]
- Notification: Notifies deals, offers, promotions, and recommendations
- Biometric authentication: Sign in using biometric authentication.
- Camera: Uses the device’s camera to read QR codes and scan your passport details pages.
- Photos, media, and files: Uses photos in the device.
- Microphone: Enables voice search
- Phone: Answers phone calls while using voice recognition (for simplified Chinese app)

※ Depending on your mobile device operating system, app permission settings may not be available. Please update your mobile device operating system to manage app permissions on your mobile device. You can reset all of your app permissions by deleting and re-installing the app.

※ Customer service center
Online shopping: +82-1688-3000
08:00 to 23:00 (KST)

creator: 롯데면세점
descriptionHtml:
Lotte Online Duty Free unveils new inclusive shopping experiences.
Meet the most powerful duty free brand in Korea and enjoy the new mobile duty free shopping paradise faster and easier for everyone.


[Services]
1.STORY: The trending news with rich visual content creates a whole new shopping experience.
2.Deals: Group buying, limited quantity, LOTTERY, voting, and other special deals are waiting for you.
3.Me First: Do you want to order an out-of-stock item? Use the Me First service. It will automatically place an order when the item is back in stock.
4.Search: Search duty free items, brands, and online & in-store rewards simultaneously.
5.AR TRY-ON: Try on different clothes and accessories without undressing or even entering the stores.


■App permissions
Lotte Duty Free observes and is bound by Paragraph 2, Article 22 (Gathering and Handling of Personal Information) of the Act on Promotion of Utilization of Information and Communications Network. Please read the following details and allow Lotte Duty Free to access, collect, and use your personal information in accordance with the Network Act. The Lotte Duty Free app will access, collect, and use the following information only for the purposes stated. You can change your app permissions whenever you want. Additional permissions are not required to use the Lotte Duty Free app.


[Additional permissions are required for the followings]
- Notifications: Notifies deals, offers, promotions, and recommendations.
- Biometric authentications: Signs in using biometric authentication.
- Camera: Uses the device’s camera to read QR codes, scan your passport details page, and activate AR services.
- Photos, media, and files: Uses photos in the device.
- Microphone: Enables voice search.

Meet the most powerful duty free brand in Korea and enjoy the new mobile duty free shopping paradise faster and easier for everyone.


[Services]
1.STORY: The trending news with rich visual content creates a whole new shopping experience.
2.Deals: Group buying, limited quantity, LOTTERY, voting, and other special deals are waiting for you.
3.Me First: Do you want to order an out-of-stock item? Use the Me First service. It will automatically place an order when the item is back in stock.
4.Search: Search duty free items, brands, and online & in-store rewards simultaneously.
5.AR TRY-ON: Try on different clothes and accessories without undressing or even entering the stores.
6.Personalization: From products to vacation destinations! Best recommendations just for you. Meet the new shopping experience.

■App permissions
Lotte Duty Free observes and is bound by Paragraph 2, Article 22 (Gathering and Handling of Personal Information) of the Act on Promotion of Utilization of Information and Communications Network. Please read the following details and allow Lotte Duty Free to access, collect, and use your personal information in accordance with the Network Act. The Lotte Duty Free app will access, collect, and use the following information only for the purposes stated. You can change your app permissions whenever you want. Additional permissions are not required to use the Lotte Duty Free app.


[Additional permissions are required for the followings]
- Notifications: Notifies deals, offers, promotions, and recommendations.
- Biometric authentications: Signs in using biometric authentication.
- Camera: Uses the device’s camera to read QR codes, scan your passport details page, and activate AR services.
- Photos, media, and files: Uses photos in the device.
- Microphone: Enables voice search.

※Customer support
Online shopping: +82-1688-3000
09:00 to 18:00 (KST)

creator: 롯데면세점
descriptionHtml:
Lotte Online Duty Free unveils new inclusive shopping experiences.
Meet the most powerful duty free brand in Korea and enjoy the new mobile duty free shopping paradise faster and easier for everyone.


[High quality features and services]
1. IN-STORE SERVICES: Improves the customer’s in-store shopping experience with different mobile shopping services such as brand store visit reservation, mobile queue ticket, and self-checkout services.
2. RECOMMENDATIONS: Provides highly personalized product, promotion, and content recommendations that suit each customer best.
3. HOME: Offers unmissable chances Lotte Duty Free prepares for their customers.
4. SALE: Presents today’s deals, glitching deals, and other money saving special deals.
5. EVENT: Helps customers navigate online and in-store promotions more comfortably.
6. RANKING: Gives a special duty free shopping guide that helps customers shop more quickly and easily.
7. STORY: Shows different visual and product curations created by Lotte Duty Free editors
8. AR: Allows customers to try products on without physically visiting a store.

■ App permissions
Lotte Duty Free observes and is bound by Paragraph 2, Article 22 (Gathering and Handling of Personal Information) of the Act on Promotion of Utilization of Information and Communications Network. Please read the following details and give your consent for access, collection, and use of your personal information by Lotte Duty Free in accordance with the Network Act+E27. The Lotte Duty Free App will only access, collect, and use the following information with your consent for the purposes stated. You can change your app permissions whenever you want. Additional permissions are not required to use the Lotte Online Duty Free App.

- Notification: notifies deals, offers, promotions, and recommendations
- Biometric authentication : Sign in using biometric authentication.
- Camera: uses the device’s camera to read QR codes and scan your passport details pages.

- Location: for in-store checkout.

descriptionHtml:
Lotte Online Duty Free unveils new inclusive shopping experiences.
Meet the most powerful duty free brand in Korea and enjoy the new mobile duty free shopping paradise faster and easier for everyone.


[High quality features and services]
1. IN-STORE SERVICES: Improves the customer’s in-store shopping experience with different mobile shopping services such as brand store visit reservation, mobile queue ticket, and self-checkout services.
2. RECOMMENDATIONS: Provides highly personalized product, promotion, and content recommendations that suit each customer best.
3. HOME: Offers unmissable chances Lotte Duty Free prepares for their customers.
4. SALE: Presents today’s deals, glitching deals, and other money saving special deals.
5. EVENT: Helps customers navigate online and in-store promotions more comfortably.
6. RANKING: Gives a special duty free shopping guide that helps customers shop more quickly and easily.
7. STORY: Shows different visual and product curations created by Lotte Duty Free editors
8. AR: Allows customers to try products on without physically visiting a store.

■ App permissions
Lotte Duty Free observes and is bound by Paragraph 2, Article 22 (Gathering and Handling of Personal Information) of the Act on Promotion of Utilization of Information and Communications Network. Please read the following details and give your consent for access, collection, and use of your personal information by Lotte Duty Free in accordance with the Network Act+E27. The Lotte Duty Free App will only access, collect, and use the following information with your consent for the purposes stated. You can change your app permissions whenever you want. Additional permissions are not required to use the Lotte Online Duty Free App.


[Additional]
- Notification: notifies deals, offers, promotions, and recommendations
- Biometric authentication : Sign in using biometric authentication.
- Camera: uses the device’s camera to read QR codes and scan your passport details pages.
- Photos, media, and files: uses photos in the device.
- Microphone/speech recognition: enable voice search
- Location: for in-store checkout.

※ Customer service center
Online shopping: +82-1688-3020
09:00 to 18:00 (KST)

- DUTY 4 EARTH Lotte Duty Free

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Improvement in EVENT menu
-New EVENT menu will delight customers with personalized deals and offers.

Lotte Duty Free improves customers shopping experience with enhanced features
